column4: Anyone able to help me with an issue (or is this the new "desired" way to do things) regarding new 11.10 gnome3 interface? Both on gnome-classic, unity, and fluxbox, when I click the status change menu, it briefly shows itself, then hides, equally as quickly.
To change my status I have to click, hold down left mouse button, move mouse over desired status, then release left mouse.
I beleive that's the intended behaviour
